channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX2][Hosted Private Cloud] - Multiple hosts migration notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 1, 20:00 UTC  -  Apr 2, 05:00 UTC

Jan 13, 21:30 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer, affecting hosts in racks 31A12, 31A13, 31A14 and 31A15.

Start time : 01/04/2026 20:00 UTC
End time : 02/04/2026 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Hosts located in the specified racks will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance for 8 hours maximum.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will migrate Hosted Private Cloud hosts in the specified racks from RBX2 datacenter to RBX7 datacenter.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Managed VMware vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 23, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 26, 17:00 UTC

Feb 10, 22:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed VMware vSphere offer.

Start time : 23/03/2026 08:00 UTC
End time : 26/03/2026 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed VMware vSphere offer.

An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

Feb 5, 08:53 UTC

item.title: [EU/CA][Backup as a Service] - Zerto maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 9, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 12, 17:00 UTC

Feb 10, 21:25 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Backup as a Service offer.

Start time : 09/03/2026 08:00 UTC
End time : 12/03/2026 17:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance window, the synchronization between the primary and secondary sites will be interrupted. As a result, the customer will not be able to activate the Disaster Recovery service.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Backup as a Service offer.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX][Managed VMware vSphere] - Rack R820L21 incident notification
item.description:
Mar 2, 07:32 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed VMware vSphere offer on the specific RBX regions.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 02/03/2026 07:25 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts located on the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Most hosts are now operational again on R805L26 and R805L27.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are still working to restore service on R805L25 and the remaining hosts that are still down.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
